source:
def complex_play():
  RECT()
  FIX(3)
  RES = (5 + 3j) + (7 - 9j)
  PROMPT('res', RES)  # should be 12-i6 or in Python 12-6j
  assert isCPX(RES)
  assert RES == (12 - 6j)
  
  RES2 = SQRT(-25)  # should be 0+i5
  PROMPT('sqrt res', RES2)
  real, imag = COMPLEX(0,RES2)
  assert real == 0
  assert IP(imag) == 5
  
  RES_POL = toPOL(1, RES2)
  PRA('respol', RES_POL, 'rnd', RND(RES_POL))
  PRA('cpx', COMPLEX(5, 1.571), 'rnd', RND(5 + 1.571j))
  assert RND(RES_POL) == RND(COMPLEX(5, 1.571))  # RND to allow compare to work
  print('complex tests pass ok')
title: Complex test
